name: Vegetarian Meal
description: Meal prepared without meat, poultry, or fish. May contain dairy products or eggs.

name: Asian Vegetarian Meal
description: Spicy vegetarian meal prepared in an Indian style, without meat, poultry, fish, or eggs. May contain dairy products.

name: Vegetarian Jain Meal
description: Strict vegetarian meal for Jain community members, excluding all root vegetables, meat, poultry, fish, and animal products.

name: Hindu Non-Vegetarian Meal
description: Non-vegetarian meal prepared in an Indian style, typically with lamb, chicken, fish, eggs, and dairy. Does not contain beef or pork.

name: Muslim Meal (Halal)
description: Meal prepared according to Halal requirements, without pork, alcohol, or non-Halal meats.

name: Kosher Meal
description: Meal prepared according to Jewish dietary laws, under rabbinical supervision.

name: Child Meal
description: Meal suitable for children aged 2 to 12 years, typically soft and easy to eat.

name: Baby Meal
description: Meal suitable for infants up to 2 years old, typically pureed food in jars.

name: Diabetic Meal
description: Meal suitable for passengers with diabetes, typically low in sugar and balanced in carbohydrates.

name: Gluten-Free Meal
description: Meal prepared without wheat, rye, barley, oats, or any gluten-containing ingredients.

name: Low-Calorie Meal
description: Meal with reduced calorie content, often high in fiber and low in fat.

name: Low-Fat Meal
description: Meal low in fat and cholesterol.

name: Low-Sodium Meal
description: Meal prepared with no added salt.

name: Non-Lactose Meal
description: Meal prepared without milk or dairy products.

name: Seafood Special Meal
description: A special meal featuring seafood as the main component.

name: Standard Meal
description: The default meal option provided by the airline, varies by route and class.

name: Snack Box
description: A light snack, often provided on shorter flights or as an option to purchase.

name: Non-Vegetarian Sandwich
description: A sandwich with non-vegetarian fillings (e.g., chicken, turkey).
